attributes.action: Pay for our Veterans to attend the 65th Anniversary Rememberance Service for the D-Day landings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is in support of our D-Day veterans who want and need to attend the 65th anniversary of the D-Day landings rememberance service. This is not for them to have a nice little trip away it is so they can remember fallen comrades to whom we owe so much.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
